name: Hentai Hack-Her
description:
Explore your new desktop, choose your wallpaper, listen to music, check out the web and even install applications.

Now having your very own desktop, who could imagine.

Install "Hack-Her" when you're ready and jump into the 2D shooter hacking software. You will be able hack your targets webcam, allowing you to hear everything she says, see everything she does and best of all, she will never know. You will encounter various enemies with increasing difficulty over time. But, the longer you survive, the more you will see, hear and unlock.

You can then upload the data you hacked via the in-game "web browser", competing with other players for the highest score.
